title: Abdullah Al Mahmud
text:
I am a lecturer in statistics at Sylhet Cadet College, Sylhet. Earlier I taught statistics at Pabna Cadet College. Before joining Cadet College service, I was employed as a research assistant at EAL, Dhaka. I also worked as a science contributor for The Daily Prothom Alo.
I have, with the pen name Abdullah Adil Mahmud (‡¶Ü‡¶¨‡ßç‡¶¶‡ßÅ‡¶≤‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶π ‡¶Ü‡¶¶‡¶ø‡¶≤ ‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶Æ‡ßÅ‡¶¶), written Six science books, which are all available for purchase on Rokomari.com.
Hailing from Lakshmipur Sadar Upazila, I graduated with B.S. and M.S. degrees from the University of Dhaka.
I founded Bishwo.com and serve as the editor and contributor of ‡¶Æ‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶∂‡ßç‡¶¨ and Stat Mania.
I am very passionate about teaching, writing, programming, and data analysis, and I continue doing all of them.
Learning is by far my best hobby. In my free time, I love to roam around, connect with people, and watch sky.
I am married üíì to Salma Siddika, also an alumna of University of Dhaka.

title: Career
text:
2010: Started Blogging
2014: First magazine article published on Pie Zero to Infinity
2014: Started writing on and editing Byapon Science Magazine
2016: Started Writing for Bigganchinta Science Magazine
2017: First Book Published
2017: Started professional research works in national projects
2019: Joined as a Research Assistant at Engineers and Advisers Ltd.¬†(EAL)
2019: First scientific conference at MBSTU
2019: Joined in Pabna Cadet College
2020: Scientific Paper on Benford‚Äôs Law published
2022: Joined in Sylhet Cadet College
